729211f-b.text:
New Street, at the N. W. corner of Heberton Avenue, sbowing the garden of Public School No. 20. Views 1 and 2 were taken the same time.
About 1910
Views i,2
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
729211f-b.folder: New Street & Heberton Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729211f-a.text:
New Street, at the N. W. corner of Heberton Avenue, sbowing the garden of Public School No. 20. Views 1 and 2 were taken the same time.
About 1910
Views i,2
By Mulford Simonson
From P. L. Sperr Collection
729211f-a.folder: New Street & Heberton Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729209f-a.text:
(1)
New Street, at the N.W. corner of Heberton Avenue. Shown is the rear of Public School No. 20, looking southward along
Heberton Avenue from Bennett Street.
April 2, 1924
P. L. Sperr
(2)
Another view of the rear of the old school building and the new additon (right) facing on Park Avenue, seen across Port Richmond Park from Park Avenue and Bennett Street.
July 5, 1932
P. L. Sperr
729209f-a.folder: New Street & Heberton Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729209f-b.text:
(1)
New Street, at the N.W. corner of Heberton Avenue. Shown is the rear of Public School No. 20, looking southward along
Heberton Avenue from Bennett Street.
April 2, 1924
P. L. Sperr
(2)

729209f-b.folder: New Street & Heberton Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729210f-a.text:
New Street, at the N.W. corner of Heberton Avenue, showing Public School No. 20, erected in 1891. The school occupies a whole square block bounded by Aew and Vreeland Streets and Park
and Heberton Avenues.
About 1905
By Mulford Simonson
F-om Staten Islamd Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr
(2) and (3)
Views 2 and 3 were taken July 15, 1930 and August 30, 1937,
respectively.
P. L. Sperr
729210f-a.folder: New Street & Heberton Avenue, Staten Island, NY
